# [EVENT NAME]

<!--
  Event
  ===

  The events that the system is interested in processing. e.g. PlayerMovedEvent, EnemySpawnedEvent, ScoreUpdatedEvent, etc.

  ## Types

  - GameEvent: Events generated by player actions or game mechanics. e.g. player movement, enemy spawn, score update.
  - SystemEvent: Events generated by adapters or external systems., e.g. sound effects, network events, input events.
-->

**Type:** `[EventType]`

Brief description of the event.

## Payload

| Field    | Type    | Description           |
|----------|---------|-----------------------|
| [Field1] | [Type1] | Description of Field1 |
| [Field2] | [Type2] | Description of Field2 |
| ...      | ...     | ...                   |
